dcterms:description: A multi-agent environment designed for testing decentralized reinforcement learning algorithms, featuring continuous state and action spaces.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Particle Environment (MPE)

dcterms:creator: B. Peng
T. Rashid
C. Schroeder de Witt
P.-A. Kamienny
P. Torr
W. Böhmer
S. Whiteson
dcterms:description: A collection of continuous multi-agent robotic control tasks based on OpenAI's MuJoCo, allowing for complex interactions among agents.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent MuJoCo

dcterms:creator: K. Kurach
A. Raichuk
P. Stańczyk
M. Zając
O. Bachem
L. Espeholt
C. Riquelme
D. Vincent
M. Michalski
O. Bousquet
dcterms:description: A novel reinforcement learning environment designed to simulate football games, providing a platform for testing multi-agent learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Google Research Football (GRF)

dcterms:description: A cooperative game with specific parameters designed to test decentralized policy optimization methods.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Game

dcterms:description: A task where four agents learn to cooperate to reach designated landmarks.
dcterms:title: 4-Agent Cooperative Navigation

dcterms:description: A task where five agents learn to form a regular polygon while cooperating.
dcterms:title: 5-Agent Regular Polygon Control

dcterms:description: Tasks involving Hopper, Ant, and HalfCheetah in a multi-agent setting, focusing on robotic control.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent MuJoCo Tasks (Hopper, Ant, HalfCheetah)
